### Downloading R & RStudio

When downloading the software, check that it is going into a sensible location on your pc - avoid downloading them to OneDrive

#### Step 1: Download R

Download the [MacOS version](https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/macosx/R-4.0.2.pkg) or the [Windows version](https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/R-4.0.2-win.exe).


#### Step 2: Download RStudio

Download the [MacOS version](https://download1.rstudio.org/desktop/macos/RStudio-1.3.1093.dmg) or the [Windows version](https://download1.rstudio.org/desktop/windows/RStudio-1.3.1093.exe).
